1: וַיֵּרָ֤א <sup>7200 </sup> <n>appeared</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> בְּאֵלֹנֵ֖י <sup>436 </sup> <n>unto him in the plains</n> מַמְרֵ֑א <sup>4471 </sup> <n>of Mamre</n> וְה֛וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יֹשֵׁ֥ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and he sat</n> פֶּֽתַח־ <sup>6607 </sup> <n>door</n> הָאֹ֖הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>in the tent</n> כְּחֹ֥ם <sup>2527 </sup> <n>in the heat</n> הַיּֽוֹם׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>of the day</n>
2: וַיִּשָּׂ֤א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>And he lift up</n> עֵינָיו֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>his eyes</n> וַיַּ֔רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and looked</n> וְהִנֵּה֙ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <sup>7969 </sup> <n>and lo three</n> אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> נִצָּבִ֖ים <sup>5324 </sup> <n>stood</n> עָלָ֑יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>opposite</n> וַיַּ֗רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>by him and when he saw</n> וַיָּ֤רָץ <sup>7323 </sup> <n>[them] he ran</n> לִקְרָאתָם֙ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>to meet</n> מִפֶּ֣תַח <sup>6607 </sup> <n>door</n> הָאֹ֔הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>them from the tent</n> וַיִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and bowed</n> אָֽרְצָה׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>himself toward the ground</n>
3: וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And said</n> אֲדֹנָ֗י <sup>113 </sup> <n>my lord</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> נָ֨א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> מָצָ֤אתִי <sup>4672 </sup> <n>if now I have found</n> חֵן֙ <sup>2580 </sup> <n>favour</n> בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in thy sight</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> נָ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>please</n> תַעֲבֹ֖ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>pass not away</n> מֵעַ֥ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>I pray thee from thy servant</n>
4: יֻקַּֽח־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>be fetched</n> נָ֣א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>I pray you</n> מְעַט־ <sup>4592 </sup> <n>Let a little</n> מַ֔יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n> וְרַחֲצ֖וּ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>and wash</n> רַגְלֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>7272 </sup> <n>your feet</n> וְהִֽשָּׁעֲנ֖וּ <sup>8172 </sup> <n>and rest yourselves</n> תַּ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> הָעֵֽץ׃ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>under the tree</n>
5: וְאֶקְחָ֨ה <sup>3947 </sup> <n>And I will fetch</n> פַת־ <sup>6595 </sup> <n>a morsel</n> לֶ֜חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of bread</n> וְסַעֲד֤וּ <sup>5582 </sup> <n>and comfort ye</n> לִבְּכֶם֙ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>your hearts</n> אַחַ֣ר <sup>310 </sup> <n>after that</n> תַּעֲבֹ֔רוּ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>ye shall pass on</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>to</n> כֵּ֥ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>So</n> עֲבַרְתֶּ֖ם <sup>5674 </sup> <n>for therefore are ye come</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> עַבְדְּכֶ֑ם <sup>5650 </sup> <n>your servant</n> וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>as thou hast said</n> כֵּ֥ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>So</n> תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>So do</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>And they said</n>

8: וַיִּקַּ֨ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>And he took</n> חֶמְאָ֜ה <sup>2529 </sup> <n>butter</n> וְחָלָ֗ב <sup>2461 </sup> <n>and milk</n> וּבֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> הַבָּקָר֙ <sup>1241 </sup> <n>bull</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which he had dressed</n> וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and set</n> לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>[it] before them</n> וְהֽוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and he</n> עֹמֵ֧ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and he stood</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> תַּ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> הָעֵ֖ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>by them under the tree</n> וַיֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and they did eat</n>

10: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> שׁ֣וֹב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>I will certainly</n> אָשׁ֤וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>return</n> אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> כָּעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>unto thee according to the time</n> חַיָּ֔ה <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of life</n> וְהִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> בֵ֖ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>shall have a son</n> לְשָׂרָ֣ה <sup>8283 </sup> <n>and lo Sarah</n> אִשְׁתֶּ֑ךָ <sup>802 </sup> <n>thy wife</n> וְשָׂרָ֥ה <sup>8283 </sup> <n>And Sarah</n> שֹׁמַ֛עַת <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> פֶּ֥תַח <sup>6607 </sup> <n>door</n> הָאֹ֖הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>[it] in the tent</n> וְה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>which</n> אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <sup>310 </sup> <n>which [was] behind him</n>
